description: This file defines the IOttPermissionCache interface for a permission cache used within the OttServices plugin. It declares methods for retrieving, updating, invalidating, and checking permissions associated with application identifiers, as well as clearing the cache and obtaining its size.

classes.name: IOttPermissionCache
classes.description: An interface for permission cache operations within the OttServices plugin, inheriting from Core::IUnknown to participate in interface mapping. Defines methods for permission retrieval, update, invalidation, and cache management.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves a vector of permission strings associated with a given application ID.

methods.name: UpdateCache
methods.description: Replaces cached permissions for the specified application ID with a new set.

methods.name: Invalidate
methods.description: Removes any cached permissions for the specified application ID.

methods.name: Has
methods.description: Checks if the cache contains an entry for the specified application ID.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Returns the number of application IDs currently cached.

ctags.name: IOttPermissionCache
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IOttPermissionCache : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
